main.name: Welcome to my home page!
main.description: I am currently a third year undergrad majoring in Computer Science and Engineering at IIT Kanpur
main.bio: Hey there! I am a computer science undergrad at Indian Institute of Technology(IIT), Kanpur. I am interested in fields related to applications of ML, AI and Computer vision. Besides this, I have a deep interest in learning about Cybersecurity and Algorithms. Apart from academics, I love to indulge in any kind of sports. I enjoy playing cricket, football, hockey, TT, Kabaddi and Badminton. I am fond of music too. I am an amateur guitar player and love to listen to music. I believe I have to learn a lot and I love to read books in my free time and learn something new from everyone I meet.
main.contactmessage: Meaningful discussions expand the knowledge of all the participants. Feel free to reach out if you want to have some nice conversations and discussions. The topic can be anything - fav books, music, sports, philosophy, politics, spirituality, or any other aspect of life.

resume.skillmessage: A slightly graphical presentation of the skills I have been fortunate enough to learn. I still have a lot to learn and I hope to expand the progress bars and add some more skills in future!

education.description: Probably in the best phase of my life. Enthusiastic and keen to learn about Machine Learning, AI, Algorithms, and Cybersecurity.

education.school: DAV Public School, Cantt Road, Khagaul
education.description: Had a really great and memorable time. The best thing about DAVs - they teach about natural as well as moral sciences in a really great manner.

work.title: Summer Research Intern
work.description: Worked on the Quantization of Deep Learning Models using Intel OpenVINO, and training ML models on AWS using Intel Gaudi Processors. My first internship experience. Although short, it taught me really great things about corporate work, ethics, time management, technical communication, and a lot more!!!

work.title: Incoming Summer Intern
work.description: Really excited about exploring a new domain - HFTs. Hope to have a good time there :)

achieve.title: Academic Excellence Award
achieve.description: Received the Academic Excellence Award for meritorious academic performance. Perfect CPI of 10 at the end of first year.

achieve.title: Director's Scholarship
achieve.description: Awarded for being among the top JEE rankers in the institute.

achieve.title: JEE Advanced
achieve.description: Received an All India Rank of 139 out of around 160k candidates. Overall 4th rank in the IIT Guwahati zone.

achieve.title: JEE Main
achieve.description: Received an All India Rank of 140 out of around 600k candidates.

achieve.title: CBSE Certificate of Merit
achieve.description: Among top 0.1% of students in three subjects : Physics, Chemistry and Informatics Practices. Also ended among the top 5 overall ranks in Bihar zone.

achieve.title: Kishore Vaigyanik Protsahan Yojana (KVPY)
achieve.description: Received an All Indian Rank of 465. Cleared both the written and interview rounds.

achieve.title: National Talent Search Examination
achieve.description: Cleared both the state and national level exams to become an NTSE scholar.
